nodes.text: Mekus Drin was a female Zabrak who, following the Battle of Asylum, traveled to Odessen and joined the Alliance against the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. She was assigned to the Underworld Logistics branch of the Alliance under Hylo Visz.
Mekus Drin appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion as a Bounty Hunter vendor inside Odessen base.
